summary: With no law within 200 miles horse rancher Jeremy Rodak runs his spread with an iron hand and deals with rustlers even more ruthlessly.
cast: James Cagney|Don Dubbins|Stephen McNally|Irene Papas|Vic Morrow|James Griffith|Onslow Stevens|James Bell|Jeanette Nolan|Chubby Johnson|Royal Dano|Lee Van Cleef|Peter Chong|Billy Dix|Roy Engel|John Halloran|Charles Anthony Hughes|Tom London|James McCallion|Dennis Moore|Bud Osborne|Carl Pitti|Buddy Roosevelt|Clint Sharp
keywords: revenge|horse|horse riding|dead father|writing a letter for someone
title: La ley de la horca
